mapper.insert: insert into tbl_complaint_arc( comId, comTitle, comDate, comPublic, comStatus, comContent, comAnswer, memId, deleteYn) values( #{comId}, #{comTitle}, sysdate, #{comPublic}, null, #{comContent}, #{comAnswer}, #{memId}, 0 );
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_complaint_arc SET comAnswer = #{comAnswer}, comStatus = #{comStatus}, answerId = #{answerId}, answerDate= sysdate, answerPeriod= CEIL(#{answerPeriod}) , WHERE comId = #{comId}
